Ejemplo Javascript



var displayClosure = function() {
    var count = 0;
    return function () {
        return ++count;
    };
}
var inc = displayClosure();
inc(); // devuelve 1
inc(); // devuelve 2
inc(); // devuelve 3

Ejemplo PHP



public function index()
  {
    $this->load->library('pagination');
    $this->trenes_filtros->inicializar();

    $config['base_url'] = base_url() . 'empleados';
    $config['total_rows'] = $this->empleados_model->get_empleados(true);
    $config['per_page'] = 3; 
    $config['uri_segment'] = 2;
    
    $this->pagination->initialize($config);

    $data['empleados'] = $this->empleados_model->get_empleados(false, $config['per_page'], $this->uri->segment(2));

    $data['head_title'] = 'Empleados';

    $this->load->view('empleados/empleados_index_view', $data);
  }
include "footer.html" include "sidebar_right.html"
include "admin_options.html"
